channel.title: REAPER on Some Title
channel.description: Recent content in REAPER on Some Title

item.title: REAPER time sorting and labeling
item.description: #Introduction I originally used a script to change the item names in batch with REAPER, so I used it, When the tracks were separated, it felt like the name was poured into each track. I wish it was a single track, but… When I noticed it, it was divided into tracks. So I wrote a script to fill in the names in chronological order. (Also, if there are too many numbers, it seems that the letters are over, so it only worked halfway)
